column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Momo ! "
#Text=Toph says : " There 's no one else here . "
#Text=Aang says : " Katara is in trouble !
#Text=" Toph says : " Wait !
#Text=Someone 's at the door .
#Text=Actually , I know who it is .
#Text=It 's an old friend of mine .
#Text=Glad to see you 're okay .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I need your help .
#Text=" Aang says : " You guys know each other ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I met him in the woods once and knocked him down .
#Text=Then he gave me some tea and some very good advice .
#Text=" Iroh says : " May I come in ?
#Text=Princess Azula is here in Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Aang says : " She must have Katara .
#Text=" Iroh says : " She has captured my nephew as well .
#Text=" Aang says : " Then we 'll work together to fight Azula , and save Katara and Zuko .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Whoa there !
#Text=You lost me at " Zuko " .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I know how you must feel about my nephew .
#Text=But believe me when I tell you that there is good inside him .
#Text=" Sokka says : " " Good inside him " is n't enough !
#Text=Why do n't you come back when it 's outside him too , okay ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara 's in trouble .
#Text=All of Ba Sing Se is in trouble .
#Text=Working together is our best chance .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I brought someone along who might help us .
#Text=" Captured agent says : " Azula and Long Feng are plotting a coup !
#Text=They 're going to overthrow the Earth King !
#Text=" Sokka says : " My sister !
#Text=Where are they keeping Katara ?
#Text=" Captured agent says : " In the Crystal Catacombs of Old Ba Sing Se , deep beneath the palace .
#Text="
